<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Activate "Available" presence state and set Chat Service Channel ready after the the Agent Chat pulgin is installed</description>
        <name>Activate Available in Agent Chat plugin</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var glidePresenceState = new GlideRecord('awa_presence_state');
var availableStateId = "0b10223c57a313005baaaa65ef94f970";
var chatChannelIds = ["27f675e3739713004a905ee515f6a7c3","2746aa61b7b22010ffe5ef54ce11a9da"];

if(glidePresenceState.get(availableStateId)) {
	glidePresenceState.setValue('active', true);
	var glideServiceChannel = new GlideRecord('awa_service_channel');
	for(var i=0; i<chatChannelIds.length; i++) {
		var chatChannelId = chatChannelIds[i];
		if(glideServiceChannel.get(chatChannelId)) {
			var channelList = glidePresenceState.getValue('service_channels');
			if(!channelList || channelList.indexOf(chatChannelId) == -1) {
				if(channelList) {
					channelList += "," + chatChannelId;
				} else {
					channelList = chatChannelId;
				}
			}
		}
		glidePresenceState.setValue('service_channels', channelList);
	}
	glidePresenceState.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>

    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
